summary: This bill, the Rural Health Care Facility Technical Assistance Program Act, aims to expand and codify the existing Rural Hospital Technical Assistance Program. It tasks the Secretary of Agriculture with establishing a program to provide technical assistance and training to eligible health care facilities in rural areas. The program will help these facilities identify development needs, manage finances, and apply for relevant USDA loan and grant programs. The bill outlines goals for the program, details eligibility criteria, and includes reporting requirements to Congress. It authorizes funding of up to $2,000,000 annually from 2026-2030, and defines key terms related to the program.
